recommendations.name: Hades
recommendations.description: Based on your 200+ hours in roguelikes and love for fast-paced combat, Hades perfectly matches your playstyle. Its tight combat loop and narrative depth align with your preference for story-rich action games.

recommendations.name: Deep Rock Galactic
recommendations.description: Your co-op gaming sessions with friends and love for team-based shooters make Deep Rock Galactic a perfect fit. The procedural caves and class system match your exploration tendencies.

recommendations.name: Baldur's Gate 3
recommendations.description: Your extensive playtime in RPGs and appreciation for meaningful choices suggests you'll love BG3. The D&D mechanics complement your strategic approach to combat encounters.

recommendations.name: Hollow Knight
recommendations.description: Your appreciation for atmospheric exploration and skill-based combat makes Hollow Knight ideal. The interconnected world design matches your completionist tendencies.

recommendations.name: Apex Legends
recommendations.description: Your competitive FPS history and squad-based play sessions indicate Apex would suit your playstyle. The legend abilities align with your preference for tactical gameplay.

recommendations.name: Stardew Valley
recommendations.description: Your late-night gaming sessions and interest in relaxing gameplay suggest Stardew Valley as a perfect wind-down game. The farming loop matches your progression-focused playstyle.

recommendations.name: Dead Cells
recommendations.description: Your mastery of action games and love for tight combat mechanics make Dead Cells a natural choice. The procedural levels and weapon variety match your experimentation style.

recommendations.name: Elden Ring
recommendations.description: Your souls-like experience and open-world exploration hours suggest Elden Ring will captivate you. The build variety complements your theorycrafting tendencies.

recommendations.name: Celeste
recommendations.description: Your patience with difficult games and love for tight controls make Celeste a great match. The assist mode options align with your preference for accessibility.

recommendations.name: Valheim
recommendations.description: Your co-op building sessions and survival game hours indicate Valheim fits your style. The Viking theme matches your interest in mythology-based games.

recommendations.name: Risk of Rain 2
recommendations.description: Your roguelike passion and co-op preferences make Risk of Rain 2 perfect. The escalating chaos matches your love for high-intensity gaming sessions.

recommendations.name: Terraria
recommendations.description: Your crafting game history and exploration tendencies suggest Terraria's depth will hook you. The boss progression aligns with your goal-oriented gameplay.
